sentences.english: Ooh, the more I get of you, stranger it feels, yeah.
sentences.chinese: 噢，獲得越多，感覺越發奇麗，是的。

sentences.english: Let 's enjoy the wonderful view of Taihu Lake.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來欣賞太湖的奇麗風光吧。

sentences.english: EX : I still can keep my skin darizonazling.
sentences.chinese: 我還是可能具有奇麗的肌膚。

sentences.english: It is a very attrplayioning country with many mountains.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個多山的奇麗國度。

sentences.english: Let my love; like sunlight; surround you yet give you illumined freedom.
sentences.chinese: 讓我的愛如陽光般將你擁抱，並贈你奇麗的自在。

sentences.english: A mild climate, the seasons have Qili scenery.
sentences.chinese: 氣候溫和，四季都有奇麗的景色。

definition: inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
sky clears after rain/new hopes after a disastrous period (idiom)/every cloud has a silver lining (idiom)/see also 雨過天晴|雨过天晴[yu3 guo4 tian1 qing2]
to blend into one another/to blend together well
to miss/to yearn day and night
